			}

	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner

	immediate = {
		lida_ongoing_sex_effect = {
			STAMINA_COST_1 = 0
			STAMINA_COST_2 = 1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:partner_stamina
		}
		store_subdom_value_effect = yes
		calculate_dom_success_effect = yes
		random_list = {
			# FM_HANDJOB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 1000700
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:dom_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = dom_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# FM_BLOWJOB_DOM
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 1000800
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:sub_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sub_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random = {
			chance = 5
			become_more_dom_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 5
				become_more_sub_effect = yes
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = partner_naked
			value = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 1000700: EventsSex.FM_WHIP_TEASE -> EventsSex.FM_HANDJOB
		name = LIDAoption.1000700
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 1000700
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 1000700
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 1000700
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = next_event
				value = event_id:LIDAs.7
			}
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = -1000700
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 1000800
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAs.8
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 1000800: EventsSex.FM_WHIP_TEASE -> EventsSex.FM_BLOWJOB_DOM
		name = LIDAoption.1000800
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 1000800
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 1000800
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 1000800
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.8
		}
	}
	after = {
		custom_tooltip = root_stamina_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = partner_stamina_tooltip
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 1
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
		trigger_event = {
			saved_event_id = scope:next_event
		}
	}

				# You rub his thickness between your feet, watching as he flushes and moans.\n

				desc = sex_transition.36.36.666
			}
		}

			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition < 0
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 2
			}
			# defaulted to 2003600: EventsSex.FM_FOOTJOB_TEASE -> EventsSex.FM_FOOTJOB
			desc = sex_transition.2.36.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition < 0
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 36

		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = -36003600
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 36000800
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAs.8
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 36000800: EventsSex.FM_FOOTJOB -> EventsSex.FM_BLOWJOB_DOM
		name = LIDAoption.36000800
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 36000800
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 36000800
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 36000800
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.8
		}
	}
	after = {
		custom_tooltip = root_stamina_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = partner_stamina_tooltip
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 36
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
		trigger_event = {
			saved_event_id = scope:next_event
		}
	}
}
LIDAs.3 = {
	# FM_HANDJOB_TEASE: Handjob Tease
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAs.3.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		reference = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		reference = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		reference = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		reference = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		reference = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		reference = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		reference = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		reference = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		reference = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		reference = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		reference = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		reference = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		reference = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		reference = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		reference = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		reference = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		reference = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		reference = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		reference = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = idle
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = personality_content
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAs.3.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		lida_ongoing_sex_effect = {
			STAMINA_COST_1 = 0
			STAMINA_COST_2 = 1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:partner_stamina
		}
		store_subdom_value_effect = yes
		calculate_dom_success_effect = yes
		random_list = {
			# FM_HANDJOB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 3000700
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:dom_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = dom_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# FM_BLOWJOB_DOM
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 3000800
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:sub_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sub_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random = {
			chance = 5
			become_more_dom_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 5
				become_more_sub_effect = yes
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = partner_naked
			value = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 3000700: EventsSex.FM_HANDJOB_TEASE -> EventsSex.FM_HANDJOB
		name = LIDAoption.3000700
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 3000700
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 3000700
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 3000700
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = next_event
				value = event_id:LIDAs.7
			}
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = -3000700
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 3000800
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAs.8
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 3000800: EventsSex.FM_HANDJOB_TEASE -> EventsSex.FM_BLOWJOB_DOM
		name = LIDAoption.3000800
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 3000800
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 3000800
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 3000800
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.8
		}
	}
	after = {
		custom_tooltip = root_stamina_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = partner_stamina_tooltip
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 3
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
		trigger_event = {
			saved_event_id = scope:next_event
		}
	}
}

					value = 5000700
				}
			}

			# FM_ASS_RUB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {

					}
				}

					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 5001400
				}

					scope:finisher_stamina > 0

				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sub_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}

			chance = 5
			become_more_dom_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 5
				become_more_sub_effect = yes
			}
		}

			name = partner_naked
			value = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 6000700: EventsSex.FM_TIT_TEASE -> EventsSex.FM_HANDJOB
		name = LIDAoption.6000700
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 6000700
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 6000700
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 6000700
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = next_event
				value = event_id:LIDAs.7
			}
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = -6000700
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 6000800
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAs.8
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 6000800: EventsSex.FM_TIT_TEASE -> EventsSex.FM_BLOWJOB_DOM
		name = LIDAoption.6000800
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {

				scope:sub_transition_1 = 6000800

			CHANGE = -1
		}

			name = sex_transition
			value = 6000800
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.8
		}
	}
	after = {
		custom_tooltip = root_stamina_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = partner_stamina_tooltip
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 6
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
		trigger_event = {
			saved_event_id = scope:next_event
		}
	}

LIDAs.37 = {
	# FM_BLOWJOB_DOM_I: Dom Blowjob I
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAs.37.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		reference = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		reference = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		reference = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		reference = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night

	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = throne_room_ruler_3
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}

				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}

	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 8003700
				}
				# Dom Blowjob
				# You continue to bob your head back and forth, occasionally glancing up and making adjustments based on their expression. The fact that you have total control over [affairs_partner.GetFirstName]'s pleasure makes you excited.\n

			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -8000700
				}

				desc = sex_transition.8.7.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -8003700
				}
				# 8003700: EventsSex.FM_BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsSex.FM_BLOWJOB_DOM_I failed

			}

				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -8000510
				}
				# 8000510: EventsSex.FM_BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsCum.FM_RUINED_ORGASM failed
				# As you try to pull back, he holds the back of your head with his hands.\n
				desc = sex_transition.CUM.8.5.666
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition < 0
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 8
			}
			# defaulted to 8003700: EventsSex.FM_BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsSex.FM_BLOWJOB_DOM_I
			desc = sex_transition.8.37.0
		}

	}

			STAMINA_COST_1 = 0.5
			STAMINA_COST_2 = 2

		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:partner_stamina

		store_subdom_value_effect = yes
		calculate_dom_success_effect = yes

				}

	option = {
		# 37003800: EventsSex.FM_BLOWJOB_DOM_I -> EventsSex.FM_BLOWJOB_DOM_II
		name = LIDAoption.37003800
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 37003800
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = next_event
				value = event_id:LIDAs.38
			}
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = -37003800
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 37001000
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {

					value = event_id:LIDAs.10
				}

		}
		add_internal_flag = special
	}

LIDAs.38 = {
	# FM_BLOWJOB_DOM_II: Dom Blowjob II
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAs.38.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		reference = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		reference = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		reference = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		reference = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		reference = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		reference = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		reference = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		reference = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		reference = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		reference = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		reference = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		reference = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		reference = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		reference = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		reference = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		reference = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		reference = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		reference = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		reference = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = throne_room_ruler_3
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 37003800
				}
				# Dom Blowjob I

				desc = sex_transition.37.38.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 38003800
				}
				# Dom Blowjob II
				# You continue to bob your head back and forth, occasionally glancing up and making adjustments based on their expression. The fact that you have total control over [affairs_partner.GetFirstName]'s pleasure makes you excited.\n

	# FM_BLOWJOB_SUB: Sub Blowjob
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAs.10.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		reference = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		reference = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		reference = alley_day
	}

		}
		reference = temple

		}
		reference = corridor_day

		}
		reference = courtyard

		reference = garden

			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		reference = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = throne_room_ruler_3
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}

				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}

		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 8001000
				}
				# Dom Blowjob
				# Your jaw and neck sore from doing all the work, you decide to let him do pick up the slack. "Come on [affairs_partner.GetFirstName], show me your mettle." \n\nInstead of wasting words, he places both hands behind your head and starts thrusting.\n

			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 37001000
				}
				# Dom Blowjob I
				# Your jaw and neck sore from doing all the work, you decide to let him do pick up the slack. "Come on [affairs_partner.GetFirstName], show me your mettle." \n\nInstead of wasting words, he places both hands behind your head and starts thrusting.\n

			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 38001000
				}
				# Dom Blowjob II
				# Your jaw and neck sore from doing all the work, you decide to let him do pick up the slack. "Come on [affairs_partner.GetFirstName], show me your mettle." \n\nInstead of wasting words, he places both hands behind your head and starts thrusting.\n
				desc = sex_transition.38.10.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {

LIDAs.11 = {
	# FM_DEEPTHROAT: Deepthroat
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAs.11.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		reference = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		reference = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		reference = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		reference = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		reference = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		reference = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		reference = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		reference = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		reference = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		reference = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		reference = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		reference = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		reference = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		reference = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		reference = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		reference = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		reference = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		reference = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		reference = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = throne_room_kneel_2
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10001100
				}
				# Sub Blowjob
				# He takes advantage of your lack of strong resistance to dominate your mouth further. Trapping your head with his hands, he plunges deeper while you gag.\n
				desc = sex_transition.10.11.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 11001100
				}
				# Deepthroat
				# He continues fucking your throat while your vision blurs against a mixture of tears, saliva, and sex juices.\n
				desc = sex_transition.11.11.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -10000800
				}
				# 10000800: EventsSex.FM_BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsSex.FM_BLOWJOB_DOM failed
				# Putting both hands on his waist, you attempt to curb his thrusts. However, on your knees beneath him, you don't have enough leverage to forcefully stop him and he seems to have no intention of letting you back in control.\n
				desc = sex_transition.10.8.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -10000110
				}
				# 10000110: EventsSex.FM_BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsCum.FM_HANDJOB_CUM_IN_HAND failed
				# Try as you might, [affairs_partner.GetFirstName] stops you from pulling away.\n
				desc = sex_transition.CUM.10.1.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -11001000
				}
				# 11001000: EventsSex.FM_DEEPTHROAT -> EventsSex.FM_BLOWJOB_SUB failed
				# Putting both hands on his waist, you push and try to stop his thrusts. It's all in vain, however, as he ignores you.\n
				desc = sex_transition.11.10.666
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition < 0
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 10
			}
			# defaulted to 10001100: EventsSex.FM_BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsSex.FM_DEEPTHROAT
			desc = sex_transition.10.11.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition < 0
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 11
			}
			# defaulted to 11001100: EventsSex.FM_DEEPTHROAT -> EventsSex.FM_DEEPTHROAT
			desc = sex_transition.11.11.0
		}
		desc = {
			desc = LIDAs.11.desc.20
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						NOT = { has_trait = lida_sub }
					}
					desc = LIDAs.11.desc.21
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						has_trait = lida_sub
					}
					desc = LIDAs.11.desc.22
				}
			}
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		lida_ongoing_sex_effect = {
			STAMINA_COST_1 = 1.0
			STAMINA_COST_2 = 2.0
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:partner_stamina
		}
		store_subdom_value_effect = yes
		calculate_dom_success_effect = yes
		random_list = {
			# FM_BLOWJOB_SUB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 11001000
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:dom_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = dom_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# FM_DEEPTHROAT
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 11001100
				}
			}
			# FM_BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina <= 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 11000310
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# FM_DEEPTHROAT
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 11001100
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 11001100
				}
			}
			# FM_BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina <= 0
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 11000310
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 11000310
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:sub_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sub_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random = {
			chance = 10
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 10
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = partner_naked
			value = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 11001000: EventsSex.FM_DEEPTHROAT -> EventsSex.FM_BLOWJOB_SUB
		name = LIDAoption.11001000
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 11001000
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 11001000
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 11001000
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = next_event
				value = event_id:LIDAs.10
			}
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = -11001000
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 11001100
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAs.11
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 11000310
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAc.3
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 11001100: EventsSex.FM_DEEPTHROAT -> EventsSex.FM_DEEPTHROAT
		name = LIDAoption.11001100
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 11001100
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 11001100
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 11001100
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.11
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 11000310: EventsSex.FM_DEEPTHROAT -> EventsCum.FM_BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB
		name = LIDAoption.11000310
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 11000310
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 11000310
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = 0
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 11000310
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAc.3
		}
	}
	after = {
		custom_tooltip = root_stamina_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = partner_stamina_tooltip
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 11
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
		trigger_event = {
			saved_event_id = scope:next_event
		}
	}
}

		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 4000610
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = next_event
				value = event_id:LIDAc.6
			}
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = -4000610
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 4001200
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAs.12
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 4000710
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAc.7
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 4000710: EventsSex.FM_ASS_TEASE -> EventsCum.FM_CUM_ON_GROIN
		name = LIDAoption.4000710
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 4000710
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 4000710
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = 0
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 4000710
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAc.7
		}
	}
	after = {
		custom_tooltip = root_stamina_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = partner_stamina_tooltip
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 4
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
		trigger_event = {
			saved_event_id = scope:next_event
		}
	}
}

				name = sex_transition
				value = -14000610
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 14001200
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAs.12
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 14000710
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAc.7
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 14000710: EventsSex.FM_ASS_RUB -> EventsCum.FM_CUM_ON_GROIN
		name = LIDAoption.14000710
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 14000710
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 14000710
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = 0
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 14000710
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAc.7
		}
	}
	after = {
		custom_tooltip = root_stamina_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = partner_stamina_tooltip
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 14
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
		trigger_event = {
			saved_event_id = scope:next_event
		}
	}
}

		# 12001200: EventsSex.FM_HOTDOG -> EventsSex.FM_HOTDOG

				CHANGE = 1

			value = 9

		}

}
LIDAs.15 = {
	# FM_REVERSE_COWGIRL: Ride Facing Away
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAs.15.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		reference = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		reference = alley_night

		# 15001500: EventsSex.FM_REVERSE_COWGIRL -> EventsSex.FM_REVERSE_COWGIRL
		name = LIDAoption.15001500
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 15001500
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 15001500
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 15001500
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = next_event
				value = event_id:LIDAs.15
			}
		}

				CHANGE = -2

					scope:sub_transition_0 = 15001800
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAs.18
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 15000910
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAc.9
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 15001010: EventsSex.FM_REVERSE_COWGIRL -> EventsCum.FM_CREAMPIE_ON_TOP
		name = LIDAoption.15001010
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 15001010
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 15001010
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 15001010
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = next_event
				value = event_id:LIDAc.10
			}
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = -15001010
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 15000900
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAs.9
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 15001800
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAs.18
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 15000910
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAc.9
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 15000910: EventsSex.FM_REVERSE_COWGIRL -> EventsCum.FM_CREAMPIE_REGULAR
		name = LIDAoption.15000910
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 15000910
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 15000910
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 15000910
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAc.9
		}
	}
	after = {
		custom_tooltip = root_stamina_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = partner_stamina_tooltip
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 15
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
		trigger_event = {
			saved_event_id = scope:next_event
		}
	}
}

					scope:sub_transition_0 = 16000910

				scope:root_stamina <= 0

			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}

			}

		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 17001600
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = next_event
				value = event_id:LIDAs.16
			}
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = -17001600
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 17001700
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAs.17
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 17001800
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAs.18
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 17001110
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAc.11
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 17001700: EventsSex.FM_MISSIONARY -> EventsSex.FM_MISSIONARY

		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0

				scope:sub_transition_0 = 17001700

		}

						scope:sub_transition_0 = 18001800
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 18001800
				}
			}
			# FM_CREAMPIE_BREED
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina <= 0
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 18001110
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 18001110
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:sub_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sub_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random = {
			chance = 15
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 15
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = root_naked
			value = yes
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = partner_naked
			value = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 18001700: EventsSex.FM_PRONE_BONE -> EventsSex.FM_MISSIONARY
		name = LIDAoption.18001700
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 18001700
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 18001700
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 18001700
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = next_event
				value = event_id:LIDAs.17
			}
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = -18001700
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 18001800
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAs.18
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 18001110
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAc.11
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 18000900: EventsSex.FM_PRONE_BONE -> EventsSex.FM_STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND
		name = LIDAoption.18000900
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 18000900
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 18000900
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 18000900
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = next_event
				value = event_id:LIDAs.9
			}
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = -18000900
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 18001800
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAs.18
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 18001110
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAc.11
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 18001800: EventsSex.FM_PRONE_BONE -> EventsSex.FM_PRONE_BONE
		name = LIDAoption.18001800
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 18001800
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 18001800
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 18001800
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.18
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 18000810: EventsSex.FM_PRONE_BONE -> EventsCum.FM_PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS
		name = LIDAoption.18000810
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 18000810
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 18000810
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 18000810
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = next_event
				value = event_id:LIDAc.8
			}
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = -18000810
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 18001800
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAs.18
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 18001110
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAc.11
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 18001110: EventsSex.FM_PRONE_BONE -> EventsCum.FM_CREAMPIE_BREED
		name = LIDAoption.18001110
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 18001110
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 18001110
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 18001110
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAc.11
		}
	}
	after = {
		custom_tooltip = root_stamina_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = partner_stamina_tooltip
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 18
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
		trigger_event = {
			saved_event_id = scope:next_event
		}
	}
}
LIDAs.19 = {
	# MF_WHIP_TEASE: Whip Tease
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAs.19.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		reference = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		reference = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		reference = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		reference = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		reference = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		reference = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		reference = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		reference = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		reference = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		reference = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		reference = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		reference = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		reference = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		reference = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		reference = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		reference = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		reference = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		reference = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		reference = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = personality_content
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = idle
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAs.19.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		lida_ongoing_sex_effect = {
			STAMINA_COST_1 = 1
			STAMINA_COST_2 = 0
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		store_subdom_value_effect = yes
		calculate_dom_success_effect = yes
		random_list = {
			# MF_BLOWJOB_DOM
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 19002500
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:dom_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = dom_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_HANDJOB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 19002400
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:sub_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sub_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random = {
			chance = 5
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 5
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = root_naked
			value = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 19002400: EventsSex.MF_WHIP_TEASE -> EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB
		name = LIDAoption.19002400
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 19002400
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 19002400
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 19002400
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.24
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 19002500: EventsSex.MF_WHIP_TEASE -> EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_DOM
		name = LIDAoption.19002500
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 19002500
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 19002500
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 19002500
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = next_event
				value = event_id:LIDAs.25
			}
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = -19002500
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 19002400
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAs.24
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = easy_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = special
		}
	}
	after = {
		custom_tooltip = root_stamina_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = partner_stamina_tooltip
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 19
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
		trigger_event = {
			saved_event_id = scope:next_event
		}
	}
}

				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = easy_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = special
		}
	}
	after = {
		custom_tooltip = root_stamina_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = partner_stamina_tooltip
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 20
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
		trigger_event = {
			saved_event_id = scope:next_event
		}
	}
}
LIDAs.39 = {
	# MF_FOOTJOB: Footjob
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAs.39.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		reference = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		reference = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		reference = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		reference = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		reference = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		reference = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		reference = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		reference = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		reference = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {

		}
		reference = feast
	}
	override_background = {

		}
		reference = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {

		}
		reference = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		reference = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		reference = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		reference = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		reference = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		reference = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		reference = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		reference = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = personality_content
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = idle
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 20003900
				}
				# Footjob Tease
				# She rubs your thickness between her feet, watching as you flush and moan.\n
				desc = sex_transition.20.39.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 39003900
				}
				# Footjob
				# She continues building a rhythm going up and down your shaft with her feet\n
				desc = sex_transition.39.39.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -20002500
				}
				# 20002500: EventsSex.MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE -> EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_DOM failed
				# She refuses your suggestion and continues with complete control.\n
				desc = sex_transition.20.25.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -39002400
				}
				# 39002400: EventsSex.MF_FOOTJOB -> EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB failed
				# She stuffs your mouth with her other foot, rejecting your suggestion.\n
				desc = sex_transition.39.24.666
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition < 0
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 20
			}
			# defaulted to 20003900: EventsSex.MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE -> EventsSex.MF_FOOTJOB
			desc = sex_transition.20.39.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition < 0
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 39
			}
			# defaulted to 39003900: EventsSex.MF_FOOTJOB -> EventsSex.MF_FOOTJOB
			desc = sex_transition.39.39.0
		}
		desc = LIDAs.39.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		lida_ongoing_sex_effect = {
			STAMINA_COST_1 = 1
			STAMINA_COST_2 = 0
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		store_subdom_value_effect = yes
		calculate_dom_success_effect = yes
		random_list = {
			# MF_HANDJOB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 39002400
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:dom_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = dom_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_FOOTJOB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 39003900
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:sub_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sub_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random = {
			chance = 5
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 5
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = root_naked
			value = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 39003900: EventsSex.MF_FOOTJOB -> EventsSex.MF_FOOTJOB
		name = LIDAoption.39003900
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 39003900
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 39003900
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 39003900
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.39
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 39002400: EventsSex.MF_FOOTJOB -> EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB
		name = LIDAoption.39002400
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 39002400
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 39002400
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 39002400
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = next_event
				value = event_id:LIDAs.24
			}
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = -39002400
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 39003900
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAs.39
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = easy_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = special
		}
	}
	after = {
		custom_tooltip = root_stamina_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = partner_stamina_tooltip
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 39
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
		trigger_event = {
			saved_event_id = scope:next_event
		}
	}
}

			STAMINA_COST_2 = 0

			value = scope:root_stamina

		random_list = {
			# MF_BLOWJOB_DOM
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}

					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 21002500
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:dom_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = dom_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_HANDJOB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 21002400
				}
			}
		}

			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:sub_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sub_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random = {
			chance = 5
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 5
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = root_naked
			value = yes
		}
	}

		# 21002400: EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB_TEASE -> EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB
		name = LIDAoption.21002400
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 21002400

			value = event_id:LIDAs.24
		}
	}
	option = {

		name = LIDAoption.21002500
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 21002500
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 21002500
			}

				CHANGE = 1
			}

				name = sex_transition
				value = 21002500
			}

				}

LIDAs.23 = {
	# MF_DICK_TEASE: Dick Tease
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAs.23.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		reference = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		reference = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		reference = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		reference = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		reference = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		reference = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		reference = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		reference = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		reference = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		reference = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		reference = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		reference = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		reference = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		reference = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		reference = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		reference = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		reference = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		reference = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		reference = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = personality_content
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = idle
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAs.23.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		lida_ongoing_sex_effect = {
			STAMINA_COST_1 = 1
			STAMINA_COST_2 = 1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		store_subdom_value_effect = yes
		calculate_dom_success_effect = yes
		random_list = {
			# MF_MISSIONARY
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 23003400
				}
			}
			# MF_CUM_ON_GROIN
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina <= 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 23001910
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_MISSIONARY
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 23003400
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 23003400
				}
			}
			# MF_CUM_ON_GROIN
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina <= 0
					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 23001910
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 23001910
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:dom_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = dom_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_ASS_RUB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 23003100
				}
			}
			# MF_HANDJOB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}

		}

		}
	}
	option = {
		# 23001910: EventsSex.MF_DICK_TEASE -> EventsCum.MF_CUM_ON_GROIN

		custom_tooltip = partner_stamina_tooltip

			name = prev_event
			value = 23
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
		trigger_event = {
			saved_event_id = scope:next_event
		}
	}

LIDAs.28 = {
	# MF_DEEPTHROAT: Deepthroat
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAs.28.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		reference = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		reference = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		reference = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		reference = temple
	}

		reference = corridor_night

		}
		reference = corridor_day

		}
		reference = courtyard

		}
		reference = sitting_room

		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}

	option = {
		# 28002800: EventsSex.MF_DEEPTHROAT -> EventsSex.MF_DEEPTHROAT
		name = LIDAoption.28002800
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 28002800
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 28002800
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 28002800
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = next_event
				value = event_id:LIDAs.28
			}
		}
		else = {

				CHANGE = -2
			}

				name = sex_transition
				value = -28002800
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 28002700
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAs.27
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = easy_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = special
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 28001510: EventsSex.MF_DEEPTHROAT -> EventsCum.MF_BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB
		name = LIDAoption.28001510
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 28001510
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 28001510
			}
		}

			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 28001510
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = next_event
				value = event_id:LIDAc.15
			}
		}

			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}

				name = sex_transition
				value = -28001510

				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAs.27
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = easy_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = special
		}
	}
	after = {
		custom_tooltip = root_stamina_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = partner_stamina_tooltip
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 28
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
		trigger_event = {
			saved_event_id = scope:next_event
		}
	}

		# 22001910: EventsSex.MF_ASS_TEASE -> EventsCum.MF_CUM_ON_GROIN
		name = LIDAoption.22001910
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 22001910
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 22001910
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 22001910
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = next_event
				value = event_id:LIDAc.19
			}
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = -22001910
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 22003100
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAs.31
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 22002400
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAs.24
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 22001810
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAc.18
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = easy_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = special
		}
	}
	after = {
		custom_tooltip = root_stamina_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = partner_stamina_tooltip
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 22
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
		trigger_event = {
			saved_event_id = scope:next_event
		}
	}
}

LIDAs.29 = {
	# MF_HOTDOG: Hotdogging
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAs.29.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		reference = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		reference = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		reference = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		reference = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		reference = corridor_night

					value = event_id:LIDAs.31
				}

				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 29002900
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAs.29
				}

					scope:sub_transition_0 = 29003200

				}

				}
			}

			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = easy_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = special
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 29001810: EventsSex.MF_HOTDOG -> EventsCum.MF_ASS_TEASE_CUM_ON_ASS
		name = LIDAoption.29001810
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 29001810
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 29001810
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 29001810
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAc.18
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 29001910: EventsSex.MF_HOTDOG -> EventsCum.MF_CUM_ON_GROIN
		name = LIDAoption.29001910
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 29001910
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 29001910
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 29001910
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = next_event
				value = event_id:LIDAc.19
			}
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = -29001910
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 29003100
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAs.31
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 29002900
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAs.29
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 29003200
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAs.32
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 29002500
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAs.25
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 29001810
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAc.18
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = easy_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = special
		}
	}
	after = {
		custom_tooltip = root_stamina_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = partner_stamina_tooltip
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 29
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
		trigger_event = {
			saved_event_id = scope:next_event
		}
	}

			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 30001910
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 30001910
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 30001910
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = next_event
				value = event_id:LIDAc.19
			}
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = -30001910
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 30002900
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAs.29
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 30002500
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAs.25
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 30001810
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAc.18
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = easy_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = special
		}
	}
	after = {
		custom_tooltip = root_stamina_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = partner_stamina_tooltip
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 30
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
		trigger_event = {
			saved_event_id = scope:next_event
		}
	}

				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 32003500
				}
			}
			# MF_CREAMPIE_REGULAR
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina <= 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 32002110
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 32002600
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 32002600
				}
			}
			# MF_PRONE_BONE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {

					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 32003500

				value = -1

			chance = 10
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}

			random = {
				chance = 10
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}

			name = root_naked
			value = yes
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = partner_naked
			value = yes
		}

	option = {
		# 32003200: EventsSex.MF_REVERSE_COWGIRL -> EventsSex.MF_REVERSE_COWGIRL

			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 32003200
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 32003200
			}
		}

			CHANGE = -1

			name = sex_transition
			value = 32003200

	option = {
		# 32002600: EventsSex.MF_REVERSE_COWGIRL -> EventsSex.MF_STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND
		name = LIDAoption.32002600
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 32002600
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 32002600
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 32002600
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = next_event
				value = event_id:LIDAs.26
			}
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = -32002600

				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 32003200
				}

				add = -15
			}

				value = 32003500

	after = {
		custom_tooltip = root_stamina_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = partner_stamina_tooltip
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 32
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
		trigger_event = {
			saved_event_id = scope:next_event
		}
	}
}
LIDAs.33 = {
	# MF_COWGIRL: Ride Facing Them
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAs.33.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		reference = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		reference = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		reference = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		reference = temple
	}

		}
		reference = corridor_night

		}
		reference = corridor_day

		}
		reference = sitting_room

	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}

				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 32003300

				scope:prev_event = 34
			}
			# defaulted to 34003300: EventsSex.MF_MISSIONARY -> EventsSex.MF_COWGIRL
			desc = sex_transition.34.33.0
		}
		desc = {
			desc = LIDAs.33.desc.20
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						has_trait = lida_dom
					}
					desc = LIDAs.33.desc.21
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						has_trait = lida_sub
					}
					desc = LIDAs.33.desc.22
				}
			}
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		lida_ongoing_sex_effect = {
			STAMINA_COST_1 = 1.0
			STAMINA_COST_2 = 2.0
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		store_subdom_value_effect = yes
		calculate_dom_success_effect = yes

			# MF_HOTDOG
			10 = {

					scope:finisher_stamina > 0

					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 33002900

					value = 33002110
				}
			}

			# MF_HOTDOG
			10 = {

					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 33002900
					}

					value = 33002900
				}

					value = 33002110

		# 33003300: EventsSex.MF_COWGIRL -> EventsSex.MF_COWGIRL

				scope:sub_transition_0 = 33003300
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 33003300

	option = {
		# 33002900: EventsSex.MF_COWGIRL -> EventsSex.MF_HOTDOG
		name = LIDAoption.33002900
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 33002900
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 33002900
			}
		}
