		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = dom_success_adjustment
			value = 10
		}
		custom_tooltip = dom_success_adjustment_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 10
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 33002900
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = next_event
				value = event_id:LIDAs.29
			}
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = -33002900
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 33003300
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {

		# 33003400: EventsSex.MF_COWGIRL -> EventsSex.MF_MISSIONARY

				add = 0
			}

			}

				value = 33002110
			}

					value = event_id:LIDAc.22
				}

				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = easy_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = special
		}
	}
	after = {
		custom_tooltip = root_stamina_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = partner_stamina_tooltip
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 33
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
		trigger_event = {
			saved_event_id = scope:next_event
		}
	}
}
LIDAs.34 = {
	# MF_MISSIONARY: Missionary
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAs.34.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		reference = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		reference = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		reference = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		reference = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		reference = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		reference = corridor_day
	}

		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		reference = courtyard
	}

		}
		reference = dungeon

		}
		reference = docks

		}

		}
		reference = market

		reference = garden

		}

		}
		reference = council_chamber
	}

		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		reference = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 23003400
				}
				# Dick Tease
				# You pick up the pace and the initiative, thrusting into her cunt, yielding a yelp of surprising from [affairs_partner.GetFirstName].\n

				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 33003400
				}

				# With a spurt of strength, you overturn her dominant position and put her on her back. You lift her legs and prepare to pound her.\n
				desc = sex_transition.33.34.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 34003400
				}
				# Missionary
				# You keep her legs up, and continue nailing her from above.\n
				desc = sex_transition.34.34.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 35003400
				}
				# Putting Her in Her Place
				# She finds an opening between your thrusts and manage to roll in place, her body now facing yours, but you quickly spreads her legs and continue ploughing her.\n
				desc = sex_transition.35.34.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -23003400
				}
				# 23003400: EventsSex.MF_DICK_TEASE -> EventsSex.MF_MISSIONARY failed
				# She deftly twists her body so your thrust glances off her ass, giving her the intiative.\n
				desc = sex_transition.23.34.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -33002900

				desc = sex_transition.33.29.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -33003400

				desc = sex_transition.34.35.666
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -34002310
				}

			}

					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = -35003500
				}

				add = 0

			value = 34

			}
			# defaulted to 32003500: EventsSex.MF_REVERSE_COWGIRL -> EventsSex.MF_PRONE_BONE
			desc = sex_transition.32.35.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition < 0
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 34
			}
			# defaulted to 34003500: EventsSex.MF_MISSIONARY -> EventsSex.MF_PRONE_BONE
			desc = sex_transition.34.35.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition < 0
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 35
			}
			# defaulted to 35003500: EventsSex.MF_PRONE_BONE -> EventsSex.MF_PRONE_BONE
			desc = sex_transition.35.35.0
		}
		desc = {
			desc = LIDAs.35.desc.20
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						has_trait = lida_sub
					}
					desc = LIDAs.35.desc.21
				}
			}
			desc = {
				triggered_desc = {
					trigger = {
						has_trait = lida_dom
					}
					desc = LIDAs.35.desc.22
				}
			}
			desc = LIDAs.35.desc.23
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		lida_ongoing_sex_effect = {
			STAMINA_COST_1 = 2.5
			STAMINA_COST_2 = 3.5
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		store_subdom_value_effect = yes
		calculate_dom_success_effect = yes
		random_list = {
			# MF_PRONE_BONE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 35003500
				}
			}
			# MF_CREAMPIE_BREED
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina <= 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 35002310
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_PRONE_BONE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 35003500
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 35003500
				}
			}
			# MF_CREAMPIE_BREED
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina <= 0
					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 35002310
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 35002310
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:dom_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = dom_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_MISSIONARY
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 35003400
				}
			}
			# MF_STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 35002600
				}
			}
			# MF_PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina <= 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 35002010
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_MISSIONARY
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 35003400
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 35003400
				}
			}
			# MF_STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 35002600
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 35002600
				}
			}
			# MF_PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina <= 0
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 35002010
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 35002010
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:sub_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sub_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random = {
			chance = 15
			become_more_dom_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 15
				become_more_sub_effect = yes
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = root_naked
			value = yes
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = partner_naked
			value = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 35003400: EventsSex.MF_PRONE_BONE -> EventsSex.MF_MISSIONARY
		name = LIDAoption.35003400
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 35003400
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 35003400
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 35003400
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.34
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 35002600: EventsSex.MF_PRONE_BONE -> EventsSex.MF_STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND
		name = LIDAoption.35002600
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 35002600
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 35002600
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = 0
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 35002600
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.26
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 35003500: EventsSex.MF_PRONE_BONE -> EventsSex.MF_PRONE_BONE
		name = LIDAoption.35003500
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 35003500
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 35003500
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 35003500
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = next_event
				value = event_id:LIDAs.35
			}
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = -35003500
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 35003400
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAs.34
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 35002600
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAs.26
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 35002010
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAc.20
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = easy_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = special
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 35002010: EventsSex.MF_PRONE_BONE -> EventsCum.MF_PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS
		name = LIDAoption.35002010
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 35002010
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 35002010
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 35002010
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAc.20
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 35002310: EventsSex.MF_PRONE_BONE -> EventsCum.MF_CREAMPIE_BREED
		name = LIDAoption.35002310
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 35002310
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 35002310
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 35002310
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = next_event
				value = event_id:LIDAc.23
			}
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = -35002310
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 35003400
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAs.34
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 35002600
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAs.26
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 35002010
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = next_event
					value = event_id:LIDAc.20
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = easy_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = special
		}
	}
	after = {
		custom_tooltip = root_stamina_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = partner_stamina_tooltip
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 35
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
		trigger_event = {
			saved_event_id = scope:next_event
		}
	}
}
